ntms.code.documentation: Generic decription of the code-specific parameters for the code that has produced this IDS

ntms.code.library.documentation: List of external libraries used by the code that has produced this IDS

ntms.code.library[:].parameters.documentation: List of the code specific parameters in XML format

ntms.code.output_flag.documentation: Output flag : 0 means the run is successful, other values mean some difficulty has been encountered, the exact meaning is then code specific. Negative values mean the result shall not be used.

ntms.code.parameters.documentation: List of the code specific parameters in XML format

ntms.ids_properties.documentation: Interface Data Structure properties. This element identifies the node above as an IDS

ntms.ids_properties.comment.documentation: Any comment describing the content of this IDS

ntms.ids_properties.creation_date.documentation: Date at which this data has been produced

ntms.ids_properties.homogeneous_time.documentation: This node must be filled (with 0, 1, or 2) for the IDS to be valid. If 1, the time of this IDS is homogeneous, i.e. the time values for this IDS are stored in the time node just below the root of this IDS. If 0, the time values are stored in the various time fields at lower levels in the tree. In the case only constant or static nodes are filled within the IDS, homogeneous_time must be set to 2

ntms.ids_properties.occurrence.description: occurrence number [NOTE: this field only exists in OMAS and is not part of the ITER PDM]

ntms.ids_properties.provenance.node.documentation: Set of IDS nodes for which the provenance is given. The provenance information applies to the whole structure below the IDS node. For documenting provenance information for the whole IDS, set the size of this array of structure to 1 and leave the child "path" node empty

ntms.ids_properties.provenance.node[:].p.documentation: Path of the node within the IDS, following the syntax given in the link below. If empty, means the provenance information applies to the whole IDS.

ntms.ids_properties.provenance.node[:].s.documentation: List of sources used to import or calculate this node, identified as explained below. In case the node is the result of of a calculation / data processing, the source is an input to the process described in the "code" structure at the root of the IDS. The source can be an IDS (identified by a URI or a persitent identifier, see syntax in the link below) or non-IDS data imported directly from an non-IMAS database (identified by the command used to import the source, or the persistent identifier of the data source). Often data are obtained by a chain of processes, however only the last process input are recorded here. The full chain of provenance has then to be reconstructed recursively from the provenance information contained in the data sources.

ntms.ids_properties.provider.documentation: Name of the person in charge of producing this data

ntms.ids_properties.source.documentation: Source of the data (any comment describing the origin of the data : code, path to diagnostic signals, processing method, ...). Superseeded by the new provenance structure.

ntms.ids_properties.version_put.documentation: Version of the access layer package used to PUT this IDS

ntms.ids_properties.version_put.access_l.documentation: Version of Access Layer used to PUT this IDS
Programming language of the Access Layer high level API used to PUT this IDS

ntms.ids_properties.version_put.data_dic.documentation: Version of Data Dictionary used to PUT this IDS

ntms.time_slice.documentation: Description of neoclassical tearing modes for various time slices

ntms.time_slice[:].mode.documentation: List of the various NTM modes appearing during the simulation. If a mode appears several times, use several indices in this array of structure with the same m,n values.

ntms.time_slice[:].mode[:].calculation_m.documentation: Description of how the mode evolution is calculated

ntms.time_slice[:].mode[:].delta_diff.documentation: Extra diffusion coefficient for the transport equations of Te, ne, Ti

ntms.time_slice[:].mode[:].delta_diff_er.documentation: Index in the error_description list for "delta_diff"

ntms.time_slice[:].mode[:].deltaw.documentation: deltaw contributions to the Rutherford equation

ntms.time_slice[:].mode[:].deltaw[:].val.documentation: Index in the error_description list for "value"

ntms.time_slice[:].mode[:].detailed_evol.documentation: Detailed NTM evolution on a finer timebase than the time_slice array of structure
Description of how the mode evolution is calculated
Extra diffusion coefficient for the transport equations of Te, ne, Ti
Index in the error_description list for "delta_diff"
deltaw contributions to the Rutherford equation
Index in the error_description list for "value"
Time derivative of the frequency of the mode
Index in the error_description list for "dfrequency_dt"
Time derivative of the phase of the mode
Index in the error_description list for "dphase_dt"
Time derivative of the full width of the mode
Index in the error_description list for "dwidth_dt"
Index in the error_description list for "frequency"
Index in the error_description list for "phase"
Flux coordinate on which the mode is centred
Index in the error_description list for "rho_tor"
Normalised flux coordinate on which the mode is centred
Index in the error_description list for "rho_tor_norm"
Time array used to describe the detailed evolution of the NTM
Index in the error_description list for "time_detailed"
torque contributions to the Rutherford equation
Index in the error_description list for "value"
Index in the error_description list for "width"

ntms.time_slice[:].mode[:].dfrequency_dt.documentation: Time derivative of the frequency of the mode
Index in the error_description list for "dfrequency_dt"

ntms.time_slice[:].mode[:].dphase_dt.documentation: Time derivative of the phase of the mode

ntms.time_slice[:].mode[:].dphase_dt_err.documentation: Index in the error_description list for "dphase_dt"

ntms.time_slice[:].mode[:].dwidth_dt.documentation: Time derivative of the full width of the mode

ntms.time_slice[:].mode[:].dwidth_dt_err.documentation: Index in the error_description list for "dwidth_dt"

ntms.time_slice[:].mode[:].frequency_err.documentation: Index in the error_description list for "frequency"

ntms.time_slice[:].mode[:].onset.phase.documentation: Phase of the mode at onset

ntms.time_slice[:].mode[:].onset.phase_e.documentation: Index in the error_description list for "phase"

ntms.time_slice[:].mode[:].onset.time_of.documentation: Offset time (when a mode disappears). If the mode reappears later in the simulation, use another index of the mode array of structure
Index in the error_description list for "time_offset"

ntms.time_slice[:].mode[:].onset.time_on.documentation: Index in the error_description list for "time_onset"

ntms.time_slice[:].mode[:].onset.width.documentation: Seed island full width at onset time

ntms.time_slice[:].mode[:].onset.width_e.documentation: Index in the error_description list for "width"

ntms.time_slice[:].mode[:].phase_error_i.documentation: Index in the error_description list for "phase"

ntms.time_slice[:].mode[:].rho_tor.documentation: Flux coordinate on which the mode is centred

ntms.time_slice[:].mode[:].rho_tor_error.documentation: Index in the error_description list for "rho_tor"

ntms.time_slice[:].mode[:].rho_tor_norm.documentation: Normalised flux coordinate on which the mode is centred

ntms.time_slice[:].mode[:].rho_tor_norm_.documentation: Index in the error_description list for "rho_tor_norm"

ntms.time_slice[:].mode[:].torque.documentation: torque contributions to the Rutherford equation

ntms.time_slice[:].mode[:].torque[:].val.documentation: Index in the error_description list for "value"

ntms.time_slice[:].mode[:].width_error_i.documentation: Index in the error_description list for "width"

ntms.vacuum_toroidal_field.documentation: Characteristics of the vacuum toroidal field (used in rho_tor definition)

ntms.vacuum_toroidal_field.b0.documentation: Vacuum toroidal field at R0 [T]; Positive sign means anti-clockwise when viewing from above. The product R0B0 must be consistent with the b_tor_vacuum_r field of the tf IDS.

ntms.vacuum_toroidal_field.b0_error_inde.documentation: Index in the error_description list for "b0"

ntms.vacuum_toroidal_field.r0.documentation: Reference major radius where the vacuum toroidal magnetic field is given (usually a fixed position such as the middle of the vessel at the equatorial midplane)

ntms.vacuum_toroidal_field.r0_error_inde.documentation: Index in the error_description list for "r0"
